validationMethod: Code Inspection + TypeScript Compilation + Server Health Check

acceptanceCriteria.description: The sidebar NO LONGER shows a "Métricas" navigation item
acceptanceCriteria.evidence: navigationItems array contains only 4 items: Dashboard, Kanban Board, AI Assistant, Configurações. No metrics item present.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Navigation to other pages (Dashboard, Kanban Board, AI Assistant, Settings) works correctly
acceptanceCriteria.evidence: renderView() function contains cases for all 4 modules. No orphaned routes. All navigation handlers functional.

acceptanceCriteria.description: The Dashboard still displays metrics correctly (completion rate, velocity, etc.)
acceptanceCriteria.evidence: HomePage.tsx contains all metrics display logic. Metrics APIs and types preserved. Dashboard functionality intact.

acceptanceCriteria.description: No TypeScript errors appear during compilation
acceptanceCriteria.evidence: npm run build succeeded. 1809 modules transformed. No TypeScript errors. Production build generated successfully.

acceptanceCriteria.description: No broken links or 404 errors when navigating the application
acceptanceCriteria.evidence: ModuleType union updated correctly. All navigation items have corresponding view cases. No orphaned routes.

acceptanceCriteria.description: Application loads without console errors related to missing MetricsPage or ModuleType.metrics
acceptanceCriteria.evidence: MetricsPage.tsx and MetricsPage.module.css deleted. No imports of MetricsPage. No references to 'metrics' as ModuleType.

filesModified.details: Removed metrics navigation item from navigationItems array
Updated ModuleType union type and moduleLabels Record to exclude 'metrics'
Removed MetricsPage import and 'metrics' case from renderView()

validationSteps.details: No MetricsPage import, no metrics case

recommendations: Safe to merge to main branch
optionalEnhancements: Consider adding E2E tests with Playwright for future UI changes
Add visual regression testing for sidebar layout
Document the navigation structure in a design system
